name: I Heart Virus
description:
You notice a potential virus while using your computer, but when you try to remove it something unexpected happens. When things don't go your way, do you find yourself asking, "Am I the asshole?"

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This is our entry for Mini Jam  78, but we are still working on the game. 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Credits:

Game Design, Programming, and Art - MiniMojoGames

Game Design, SFX - Jasmine Jardim - https://www.instagram.com/audio.jardim/

Music - Bruno Marques - https://www.instagram.com/obrunomarques/
